ygData.subject: Re: Subject: groups
ygData.msgSnippet: NK is nice. Lots of space, variety of prey. I did ok working the undead camp near the druid rings. Ghouls drop bronze, so if you have a magic weapon and can
ygData.messageBody:
NK is nice. Lots of space, variety of prey. I did ok working the
undead camp near the druid rings. Ghouls drop bronze, so if you have
a magic weapon and can pull them one at a time, they can be pretty
good.

There are some good drops from some named animals there as well. And
I found plenty of helpful people around most of the time.

Good hunting.

Barto Proudfoot
Zeb server

--- In EverQuest@y..., "Orion" <orionv@m...> wrote:
> Or better yet just hunt in NK.....go to the guard tower...get a
bind in the
> gypsie camp. About the same level as Oasis and not nearly as
crowded.
> Bank,etc in Qeynos...excellent hunting.
>
